pullrequest.title: Parallelize ODE physics with threaded islands parameter

content.raw:
To use the models in the way of  `model://`, it has to be downloaded and put inside the `.gazebo` folder under home , this is a one-time thing   
There is an inconsistency here,  we did use `include` for the double pendulum model.     
Let's see whether @nkoenig and @scpeters have any strong preference on whether to `include` a model with all the sdformat details or reuse with `model://`, and I will make it consistent.
content.html:
To use the models in the way of model://, it has to be downloaded and put inside the .gazebo folder under home , this is a one-time thing
There is an inconsistency here, we did use include for the double pendulum model.
Let's see whether @nkoenig and @scpeters have any strong preference on whether to include a model with all the sdformat details or reuse with model://, and I will make it consistent.
